normalized: i was the only one released.
once i managed to crawl back to gosha academy,i told them everything i knew about yukikaze and rinko.
then, orders from the government instructed by yazakicame to cancel shiranui's rescue mission.
but i…we taimanin didn't give up.
in the middle of this desperate situation, while asagi-senseimanaged to somehow deceive the government,we kept searching, looking for a way to rescue them.
as a core member of this confidential rescue mission,i exerted myself nearly to death.
since i'm still a student,i'm able to move freely without the government watching me.
i want to see yukikaze and rinko-ane again.
this thought fills my mind.
but…
everything we did so far was in vain, and it has been a year since.
we still don't know their whereabouts.
then one day, i was called by asagi-sensei early in the morning.
oddly enough, that day was my birthday.
because it's so early in the morning, there are still no other students.
i head towards asagi-sensei's room in the silent school building.

name: tatsurou
normalized: …mh?
on my way, i see things that shouldn't be in the hallway.
two big suitcases, left alone.

name: tatsurou
normalized: did someone forget them…?
i usually wouldn't notice something like that,but for some reason this worries me today.
i don't have time to worry about trifling things though.
asagi-sensei's tone, when she called me, was different from usual.
i'm sure it's about yukikaze and rinko-ane.
she also seemed to be at her wits' end.
i quickly head to asagi-sensei's room.

name: tatsurou
normalized: asagi-sensei, did you get any news about them?
after entering and greeting her, i quickly ask her.

name: asagi
normalized: take a look at this, tatsurou.
asagi-sensei speaks with a stern expression.
she's showing the screen of a computer.
a bad feeling wells up inside me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: this is about yukikaze and rinko-ane, right…?
asagi-sensei nods silently.
readying myself, i look at the monitor.
i gasp.
at first glance, it's simply a porn website.
on the front picture, two brawny men areviolating two women from behind.
however, those two are…
those two are yukikaze and rinko-ane.
there is a censor bar on their faces.
however, there is no doubt about it even with that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, rinko-ane…ku!
i clench my fist.
what's before my eyes turns me red from anger.
to force those two to do that!
the two have been violated, and are covered in cloudy leftovers.
and yet, they have a delightful expression while making a peace sign.
『the heroic taimanin's divine punishment diary』
that's the name of the website.
not content with just raping yukikaze and rinko-ane,they are putting it on display on the internet.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shit!
shit!
shit!
i punch the desk several times.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, rinko-ane…why!
yukikaze is making that face.
rinko-ane is making that face.
those two noble, beautiful girls.
with seductive eyes,
and an expression of joy from the wretched pleasure,
they are enjoying taking such an obscene picture!

name: tatsurou
normalized: shit!

name: asagi
normalized: tatsurou, they are…
asagi-sensei starts saying something, but hesitates.
this makes me come back to my sense.
that's right.
this isn't the time to be shocked by that.
this is a clue.
a clue to rescue them.

name: tatsurou
normalized: asagi-sensei, they are alive.
i understand that, but…

name: asagi
normalized: tatsurou, you're wrong.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
wrong?
i'm wrong!?
i stare at asagi-sensei.
with a sad expression, she opens her mouth.

name: asagi
normalized: this website is an underground website,hosted an oversea server.

name: asagi
normalized: you must have noticed too,those two are yukikaze and rinko.

name: asagi
normalized: but it's not just that.
on that same website,we have confirmed the identity of many taimanin that were missing.

name: tatsurou
normalized: then!
asagi-sensei holds me back.

name: asagi
normalized: calm down and listen.
eventually, all taimanin surrenderto their brutal training and torture, with videos cominguntil they have completely fallen.

name: tatsurou
normalized: v-videos of them…?
even though i was prepared, my voice shakes.

name: asagi
normalized: it's been a year since we started looking for them.
in that year, videos of their training have been uploaded.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ku…!
i bite my lip.
and now, asagi-sensei crushes the little hope i still had in me.

name: asagi
normalized: tatsurou, this is their last video.
the title is "blowing up".

name: tatsurou
normalized: b-blowing up…there's no way…
my entire body begins to tremble.
blowing up?
by 'blowing up', they don't mean…!?

name: asagi
normalized: i…confirmed its content.
while suppressing her anger, asagi-sensei speaks.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that…can't be…yukikaze…rinko-ane…that can't be…
my body is shaking.
then, then those two are…already…
dead…
however, asagi-sensei points out an even harsher fact.

name: asagi
normalized: according to the blog, they accepted their 『submission andsincere apology』 and 『the delayed punishment for breakingtheir sex slave contract』 was executed.
this was three days ago.

name: asagi
normalized: for their punishment, as a 『special favor』,『measures to keep them alive were taken beforesending them back to their hometown』.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's…!?

name: asagi
normalized: if what's written on the blog of that mr x.
is correct…akiyama, did something arrive at your house?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah!
ah!
aah!
those suitcases in the hallway.
what were those two suitcases in the hallway!?
it can't be, inside them!?
inside them!
yukikaze and rinko-ane!

name: asagi
normalized: what is it!?
do you have any clue!?
tatsurou!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uwaah!
